meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>cleanse</kanji> a <kanji>lapis lazuli</kanji> rock until it goes <kanji>glassy</kanji>, you can use it in a <vocabulary>joruri</vocabulary> performance. In case you haven't heard of joruri, it's traditional Japanese chanted storytelling, sort of like a <vocabulary>ballad</vocabulary>, that's accompanied by shamisen music, and often puppets.
readingMnemonic: You learned all these readings with the kanji, so you should be able to read this on your own.
